title: 游戏启动不了,求解!!!1
author: guidan1212
txt_content:
不解释,旧出现这样= =
     Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      

Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 --------
Generated 13-6-16 下午4:28

是不是少了什么?

replies.author: 至尊の翔哥
replies.txt_content:
沙发的瞎说,什么内存溢出撒?
你自己看第一行:Bad video card drivers
意思是值坏(bad)的显卡(video card)
估计LZ的显卡不行或是装最新的显卡驱动

replies.author: WRS君
replies.txt_content: 可能是内存溢出吧。。。你试试调整一下内存之类的 或者 MOd 冲突了
